targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', start_time) as time,
  COUNT(*) / 60.0 as requests_per_second
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE
  start_time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND start_time <= $__timeTo()
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', start_time) as time,
  percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms) as p50_latency
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE
  start_time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND start_time <= $__timeTo()
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', start_time) as time,
  percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms) as p95_latency
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE
  start_time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND start_time <= $__timeTo()
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', start_time) as time,
  percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms) as p99_latency
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE
  start_time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND start_time <= $__timeTo()
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
    operation_name,
    COUNT(*) as request_count,
    ROUND(percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as p50_ms,
    ROUND(percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as p95_ms,
    ROUND(percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as p99_ms,
    MAX(duration_ms) as max_ms
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE start_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY operation_name
HAVING COUNT(*) > 10
ORDER BY p99_ms DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
    LEFT(attributes->>'db.statement', 60) as query,
    COUNT(*) as execution_count,
    ROUND(AVG(duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as avg_duration_ms,
    ROUND(MAX(duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as max_duration_ms
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE start_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
  AND attributes->>'db.system' = 'postgresql'
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY LEFT(attributes->>'db.statement', 60)
ORDER BY avg_duration_ms DESC
LIMIT 20;

SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN status_code >= 200 AND status_code < 300 THEN 'Success (2xx)'
    WHEN status_code >= 400 AND status_code < 500 THEN 'Client Error (4xx)'
    WHEN status_code >= 500 THEN 'Server Error (5xx)'
    ELSE 'Other'
  END as status,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE start_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY status
ORDER BY count DESC;

SELECT
  operation_name,
  COUNT(*) as request_count
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE start_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY operation_name
ORDER BY request_count DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT
    date_trunc('minute', t.start_time) as time,
    t.operation_name,
    ROUND(100.0 * COUNT(DISTINCT e.id) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT t.trace_id), 0), 2) as error_rate_pct
FROM monitoring.traces t
LEFT JOIN monitoring.errors e ON t.trace_id = e.trace_id
WHERE t.start_time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND t.start_time <= $__timeTo()
  AND t.environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time, t.operation_name
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT t.trace_id) > 5
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  ROUND(AVG(duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as avg_ms,
  ROUND(percentile_cont(0.50) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as p50_ms,
  ROUND(percentile_cont(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as p95_ms,
  ROUND(percentile_cont(0.99) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY duration_ms)::numeric, 2) as p99_ms
FROM monitoring.traces
WHERE start_time > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
  AND environment = '$environment';
